welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rock Hill, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore our vibrant downtown, visit our historic sites, and enjoy all that Rock Hill has to offer. We're glad you're here!

restaurants.name: Groucho's® Deli of Rock Hill
restaurants.description: Groucho's® Deli of Rock Hill is a deli located in Rock Hill.

restaurants.name: Another Broken Egg Cafe
restaurants.description: Another Broken Egg Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Rock Hill.

restaurants.name: Lee's Famous Recipe Chicken
restaurants.description: Lee's Famous Recipe Chicken is a southern food restaurant located in Rock Hill.

restaurants.name: Millstone Pizza and Taphouse
restaurants.description: Millstone Pizza and Taphouse is a pizzeria located in Rock Hill.

restaurants.name: Shrimp Boat
restaurants.description: Shrimp Boat is a american restaurant located in Rock Hill.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport houses most of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
